p: A. aegypti was the main vector of some of the most important arboviral epidemics of all time such as Yellow fever virus (YFV) and dengue virus (DENV), which resulted in millions of fatalities worldwide ( 6, 22, 27). In addition to the extensive history of epidemics, chikungunya virus (CHIKV) and Zika virus (ZIKV) caused serious outbreaks in the Americas continent in recent years ( 9, 28â€“ 30).
